about_the_game:
The rainbow disperses, and the conflicts of color beliefs among different color schemes intensify, causing the forces of the void to stir up. We will deliver this final color to your hands, revitalizing the mainland! In PixelHero: Rainbow Legend , you need to occupy enemy territory and protect your core deployment while destroying their landmark buildings. Experience the charm of this Roguelike card building game with added strategy enhancement!

PixelHero: Rainbow Legend combines card building with pigeon elements, but most importantly: we have super cool territory blocks!

Tell your opponent who the final say the color of the land here!

In 'PixelHero: Rainbow Legend', we have changed the damage value of the traditional DBG card Rouge to a corresponding range number. At the end of each round, the side with the highest occupied territory score will cause damage to the side with the lowest score, resulting in a score difference between the two sides.

Customize your exclusive card!

Is card upgrade just a numerical addition or subtraction? no You can freely define the range and shape of your cards to deal with various tricky situations or to cooperate with other cards? Oh, by the way, if your strength allows you to even draw on it, it's really humiliating for your opponent.

Deploy on your territory!

When it comes to chessboard plots, how can there be fewer chess pieces? Can you deploy buildings that are advantageous to your side on any of your territories, such as this twin magic array that allows your attack cards to settle twice, or place a self destructing explosive magic array in the enemy's hinterland? Of course, the enemy will not sit idly by. Don't forget to protect your core deployment while attacking!

Every gaming experience is vastly different

There are always new decks Combo waiting for you to try!

  • 75 exclusive professional cards per profession

  • Over 100 powerful relics!

  • Eight major professional factions, each with different gameplay

  • Each profession has five exclusive storylines and additional cards/artifacts waiting to be unlocked

  • 30+random events!

  • 20 advanced difficulty levels

  • Every card can be upgraded!

Plan your path forward

To seal the Void Lord, you need to constantly improve your strength. Carefully choose your route, as different locations may bring different rewards. Upgrade your cards, search for relics, loot treasures, gain passive bonuses, trade with merchants, or copy cards from your deck.

War is not about extermination

It seems that you already have very powerful cards and relics, but do you think you are already very powerful? Hehe, I'm wrong. In addition to occupying land, you also need to deal with various unexpected situations. If you encounter an elf, you have to use your card to draw a pattern on the territory. Sprinkling all the colors at once will not satisfy the elf; Or if you encounter refugees, you have to switch from attacking to defending, don't accidentally injure them.

Tired of endless randomness?

It's okay, we still have multiple decryption puzzles waiting for you to solve! Kill, encircle, defend, clear hands, infinite The pleasure brought by solving numerous puzzles is no less than the combination of meat pigeon cards.
